column5: This curation contains a mix of two types of films: - Films that are under the Science Fiction genre, but that are specifically characterized for their concern of accuracy & logic. A prime example of this is Primer by Shane Carruth. -Â Films that are extremely realistic, with a mild to strong science fiction component, and do not necessarily rely on rigorous scientific theory, but the film mechanics are flawless & coherent. A prime example of this is Stalker by Andrei Tarkovsky.
